DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to enhance probe stabilization using a 4mm clear cap attached to endoscope in comparison to standard "free-hand" image acquisition.
DOC.brief_title: Confocal Endomicroscopy for GI Neoplasia Study
DOC.detailed_description: The aim of this study is to optimize and validate in-vivo imaging systems capable of highly accurate, real-time classification of colorectal neoplasia.
DOC.criteria: Those patients undergoing colonoscopy for screening or surveillance of colon polyps will be included in this study. Patients with known polyposis syndromes, inflammatory bowel disease, allergy to fluorescein, or refusal to provide informed consent.
